title: Spanish Cod Stew
ingredients: ['450g salted cod fish', '4 potatoes, thickly sliced', '2 onions, sliced', '4 hard-boiled eggs, sliced', '2 teaspoons capers', '2 large cloves garlic, finely chopped', '4 tablespoons pitted green olives', '85g roasted red peppers', '70g golden raisins', '1 bay leaf', '225g passata', '125ml extra virgin olive oil', '250ml water', '4 tablespoons white wine']
